name: iDisplay
caveats:
To install and/or use #<Cask::Cask:0x00007fc3e6fd5960> you may need to enable their kernel extension in

  System Preferences → Security & Privacy → General

For more information refer to vendor documentation or the Apple Technical Note:

  [4mhttps://developer.apple.com/library/content/technotes/tn2459/_index.html[24m

You must reboot for the installation of #<Cask::Cask:0x00007fc3e6fd5960> to take effect.
